content.description:
Two Smoking Klems has an incredible, huge move from some of the best jugs in the whole canyon.

Start in a hueco about 6 feet off the ground, and move right into a huge hueco. Get into the hand swallowing jug pocket, set your feet, and throw big to the scoop feature at the lip.
content.protection: A few pads and a spotter. The landing is great, but you're throwing big.
content.location: It is on the left side of the east face.

content.description:
Squat start with hands matched in the pocket. Move left to a pair of pockets, gain a two-finger gaston, lay into a left hand sidepull, gain the opposing shelf, and finish up the edges to reach an easy mantel.

This one gets bunched, and the two-finger can be painful.
content.protection: At least two or three pads. The landing is very good though.
content.location: It climbs the east face of Bucket Racer.

content.description: Squat start with a pair of pockets. Then gain another pocket, follow to the shelf, traverse left along the shelf, gain the opposing sidepull, and bump through the edges to reach the mantel.
content.protection: A couple of pads. The landing is perfect.
content.location: It climbs the east face of Bucket Racer.

content.description:
This is a very nice warm-up for the boulder. It utilizes most of the same climbing as

Buckethead

but with an even easier start.

Start on the far right side of the east face with a huge ledge and a large hueco, and make several easy moves to gain the large ledge halfway up. Traverse left to the more difficult reach to the lip. Top out with jugs just over the lip.
content.protection: A couple of pads, the landing is flat, but the boulder is a little tall.
content.location: Start on the far right side of the east face.

content.description:
Sit start from the edge. Move up through a pocket to a pair of pockets, make a big toss to the lip, and mantel on top.

Perhaps this is the best dyno I've encountered in Unaweep.
content.protection: A pair of pads. There is a good landing as long as you don't blow out to the left.
content.location: It climbs the east face of Bucket Racer.
